# Awesome-Robotics

## Robotics

### Tutorials
[Gazebo](https://classic.gazebosim.org/tutorials?cat=guided_i)

[Gazebo PX4](https://dev.px4.io/v1.11_noredirect/en/simulation/gazebo_worlds.html)

[Automatic addison](https://automaticaddison.com/useful-world-files-for-gazebo-and-ros-2-simulations/)

[MoveIt](https://moveit.picknik.ai/humble/index.html)

[Onshape-to-robot](https://onshape-to-robot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)

[Sensor fusion](https://gitlab.com/archerindigo/gnss-rtk-imu-fusion)

[The Construct](https://app.theconstructsim.com/)

[Webot](https://cyberbotics.com/)

[自動避障機器人](https://blog.techbridge.cc/2016/09/28/ros-collision-avoiding-robot/)

[Turtlebot 3](https://emanual.robotis.com/docs/en/platform/turtlebot3/simulation/#gazebo-simulation)

[Clearpath ros tutorials](https://www.clearpathrobotics.com/assets/guides/noetic/ros/Getting%20Started%20with%20Ubuntu.html)

[Introduction to Robot Operating System (ROS)](https://www.allaboutcircuits.com/technical-articles/an-introduction-to-robot-operating-system-ros/)

[Husarion](https://husarion.com/tutorials/ros-tutorials/1-ros-introduction/)





### SLAM
[Lidar and PCL Tutorial](https://codediversion.wordpress.com/tag/lidar/)

[Foxglove](https://foxglove.dev/tutorials)

[Webviz](https://webviz.io/)
